sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import PropTypes from 'prop-types';
import {Flex, Button, Image,Input} from '@chakra-ui/react'

CreatePost.propTypes = {
    
};

function CreatePost(props) {
    return (
        <Flex
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent = "center"
        width= "100%"
        h = "120px"
        marginTop={"80px"}
        paddingTop ="60px"
        >
            <Flex
            maxWidth= "600px"
            h="100%"
            alignItems="center"
            justifyContent = "center"
            boxShadow= "2px 2px 2px"
            border="1px solid #fefefe" 
            padding="20px" 
            backgroundColor="#f3e5ee"
            borderRadius="16px"
            position="relative"
            >
                <Image
                borderRadius='100%'
                boxSize='50px'
                src='https://bit.ly/dan-abramov'
                alt='Dan Abramov'
                />
                    
                <Input 
                backgroundColor="#ffcaed"
                borderRadius= "10px"
                w="300px"
                padding="6px"
                marginLeft ="20px"
                h="40px"
                _focusVisible={{
                    outline: "none"
                }}
                border="none"
                placeholder='Bạn đang nghĩ gì' />
            </Flex>
            <Button
            position="absolute"
            >
                Post
            </Button>
        </Flex>
    );
}

export default CreatePost;
